title: Two Year Old Child Fatally Shot in Family Trailer
content:
SAN ANGELO, Tx - Officials are investigating the shooting death of a 2 year old girl in a family trailer.
Tom Green County Sheriff's Deputies responded to the 1,000 block of FM 2105 around 12:21 pm Sunday afternoon.
Upon arrival, deputies located a 2 year-old deceased girl with a single gunshot wound.
The Tom Green County Sheriff's Office on Monday did not immediately release the name of the victim or say who's believed to have fired the weapon.
Present on the scene was the mother along with the child's three other siblings ages 1, 3 and 6.
An autopsy has been ordered.
The Tom Green County Sheriff's investigators will continue an investigation.
FOR UPDATES, CONTINUE TO CHECK BACK ON OUR CONCHOVALLEYHOMEPAGE.COM WEBSITE. NEW INFORMATION WILL BE PROVIDED AS IT IS MADE AVAILABLE.
